sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', templateUrl: './signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup.component.scss'] }) export class SignupComponent { }

Sign Up

Password is Required! Password Should Contain 8 Characters, 1 LowerCase, 1 UpperCase, 1 Number and 1 Special Character Please Confirm Your Password! Two Passwords that you entered is inconsistent! Please Input Your Username! Or login now!
